sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for measuring pH using a pH meter.
sections.scope: Applicable to routine pH measurements in Pharmaceutical Analysis laboratory.
procedure: Calibrate the instrument using standard buffer solutions.
Rinse the electrode with distilled water.
Immerse the electrode in the sample solution.
After use, rinse and store the electrode properly.
sections.precautions: Do not allow the electrode to dry. Handle electrode gently.
